image_1.description: A memorial site in the Itaewon district of Seoul, marked by flowers, candles, and notes as a tribute to the victims of the crowd surge. It is located in a narrow alleyway where most of the deaths occurred.
source_text_entities: CROWD SURGE IN THE ITAEWON DISTRICT

image_1.description: The disaster site in Itaewon district of Seoul, where a deadly crowd surge during a Halloween celebration resulted in over 150 people suffocating due to the crush in an 11-foot-wide alleyway.
source_text_entities: CROWD SURGE IN THE ITAEWON DISTRICT

image_1.description: A man in a suit kneeling at the memorial site in Itaewon district,首尔, paying tribute to the victims of the crowd surge.
source_text_entities: CROWD SURGE IN THE ITAEWON DISTRICT

image_1.description: A woman wearing a mask and holding her face at the disaster site in Itaewon district, expressing grief or shock following the deadly crowd surge.
source_text_entities: CROWD SURGE IN THE ITAEWON DISTRICT

image_2.merged_entity_name: CROWD SURGE IN THE ITAEWON DISTRICT
image_2.description: The crowd surge in the Itaewon district of Seoul was a tragic event where over 150 people suffocated due to a crush in a narrow alleyway, involving a large group of people surrounding an older man with white hair and a beard, wearing a white shirt, many holding up smartphones to take pictures or record video.
source_text_entities: CROWD SURGE IN THE ITAEWON DISTRICT

image_2.description: A Brazilian flag being held up by the man in the white shirt, symbolizing the national identity of Brazil.

image_3.description: Group of surfers in the water on the North Devon coast, Britain, some standing on their boards and others lying down, all wearing wetsuits.
Body of water with waves suitable for surfing on the North Devon coast in Britain.
Waves in the ocean on the North Devon coast in Britain that the surfers are riding.

image_4.description: Nancy Pelosi, the first female speaker of the House and the woman second in line to the presidency, is a prominent figure in American politics. She has been targeted by Republicans in various advertisements and films, including one by the Republican National Committee featuring her face framed by a gun barrel, inspired by the James Bond film 'Goldfinger'. Recently, her husband, Paul Pelosi, was attacked in a planned assault intended for her.
A colorful abstract projection is mentioned in the context of the article, although not directly linked to any specific event or person within the text.

image_5.description: Yordan Alvarez is a star player for the Astros, whose parents recently reached the U.S. from Cuba to see him play. He is also seen in an image with a man wearing a Houston Astros baseball cap, smiling and giving a thumbs-up gesture, and a woman with earrings, smiling and looking towards the man with the Astros cap.
The Astros are a baseball team for which Yordan Alvarez plays, and are also represented by a man wearing a Houston Astros baseball cap in an image.
